lead_paragraph: Where 60 percent of Native children 2 to 5 have untreated decay, the American Dental Association opposes the use of certified dental therapists.
snippet: Where 60 percent of Native children 2 to 5 have untreated decay, the American Dental Association opposes the use of certified dental therapists.

headline.main: Low-Cost Dental Care Ignites Wide Debate
headline.seo: Dental Care by Nondentists in Alaska Drives Debate
